title: Alex Morono def. Max Griffin at UFC on ESPN+ 19: Best photos
text:
Check out the best photos from Alex Morono’s unanimous decision win over Max Griffin at UFC on ESPN+ 19 at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. (Photos by Reinhold Matay, USA TODAY Sports)

Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Alex Morono (blue glove) prior to the fight against Max… Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Alex Morono (blue glove) prior to the fight against Max Griffin (not pictured) during UFC Fight Night at Amalie Arena. Mandatory Credit: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports more

Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Max Griffin (red gloves) prior to the fight against Alex… Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Max Griffin (red gloves) prior to the fight against Alex Morono (not pictured) during UFC Fight Night at Amalie Arena. Mandatory Credit: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports more

Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Max Griffin (red gloves) prior to the fight against Alex… Oct 12, 2019; Tampa, FL, USA; Max Griffin (red gloves) prior to the fight against Alex Morono (not pictured) during UFC Fight Night at Amalie Arena. Mandatory Credit: Reinhold Matay-USA TODAY Sports more
